backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend entry point defining an empty actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Lucide icon replacement, multi-accent color palette, glassmorphism card redesign) to their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a build planning reference for the project's components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, setting the page title to 'unaIITM' and mounting the app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes Navbar, Hero, QuickAccess, MessMenu, Events, Notices, and Footer within a deep forest-green radial gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Events.tsx: Events section rendering five glassmorphism cards with category badges, Lucide icons, and hover effects, opening a premium Modal with full event details on click.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer with gradient logo, navigation anchor links, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with a Heart icon and UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-viewport hero section featuring ambient glow orbs, a gradient 'unaIITM' heading, feature tag chips, dual CTA buttons, and a scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/MessMenu.tsx: Renders a 'Mess Menu' section displaying breakfast, lunch, and dinner cards in a horizontal scroll row, each with meal items, timing, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with a logo, desktop nav links, and a mobile hamburger menu that toggles a dropdown with the same links.
frontend/src/components/Notices.tsx: Displays campus notices as horizontally scrollable cards with priority indicators, opening a modal with full notice details on click.
frontend/src/components/QuickAccess.tsx: Renders a row of quick-access tiles (timetable, attendance, library, etc.) that open a BottomPanel with detailed content when clicked.
frontend/src/components/shared/BottomPan: A reusable slide-up bottom sheet overlay with a backdrop, header with title/icon, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/shared/Horizonta: A reusable horizontally scrollable container with snap scrolling, hidden scrollbar, and configurable gap and padding props.
frontend/src/components/shared/Modal.tsx: A reusable centered modal overlay with a blurred backdrop, header with optional icon and title, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/shared/SectionHe: Reusable React section header component that renders a title, optional subtitle, a colored accent bar, and a gradient underline, supporting emerald, amber, and teal accent themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the forest-green/glassmorphism design system, Tailwind base/component/utility layers, and reusable classes like glass-card, gradient-text, and canopy-texture.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with forest-green/amber/teal color palette, Inter and Playfair Display fonts, glassmorphism shadows, and custom keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 7) documenting the unaIITM campus platform's architecture, design theme, existing features, and section breakdown for build planning purposes.
